channel.title: PFAS on Silvia Canelón
channel.description: Recent content in PFAS on Silvia Canelón

item.title: Harnessing electronic health records to study emerging environmental disasters: a proof of concept with perfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS)
item.description: Proof-of-concept study detailing how Electronic Health Record (EHR) data can be leveraged to study the impacts of environmental disasters like widespread exposure perfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS).
